wikipedia_page.main: Ciara Watling née Sherwood (born 18 August 1992) is a Northern Irish footballer who plays as a midfielder for Southampton in the FA Women's National League.

response: On 24 June 2017, Jossa married television personality Dan Osborne. They have two daughters; Ella and Mia. Her cousin, Ciara Watling, is a Northern Ireland international footballer.
Watling is married to professional footballer and Northern Ireland national team player Ciara Watling who currently plays for Southampton of the FA Women's Championship.
